name: Gul Suit Set
description:
Embrace vibrant minimalism with this stunning two-tone suit set. The kurta and straight-fit pants are crafted from a smooth, lustrous Pastel Pink silk blend that provides a beautiful structure and subtle shine. The straight-cut kurta features a simple round neck with an elegant Gotta Patti border outlining the yoke, calf and side seams. The "pop" is delivered by the contrasting sheer light yellow dupatta, finished with matching gold trim, offering a playful, modern twist to the traditional silhouette.

Ideal for Mehendi ceremonies, festive lunches, or anywhere you want to make a stylish, happy statement. Pair it with simple gold flats.
specifications: Color - Pastel Pink and Contrasting Light Yellow
No. of Components - Set of 3 (Kurta, Pants, Dupatta)
Embroidery Details - Minimal Gold Gotta Trim on Yoke and Calf and Dupatta Edges
Product Highlight - Pastel Color Combination and Luxurious Silk Texture
Customization - Only Size and Length Of Product
